scripts.clean: (if exist dist rd dist /s /q) && (if exist coverage rd coverage /s /q) && node build\clean.js
scripts.ensure-dist-dir: if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.ensure-bundles-dir: npm run ensure-dist-dir && (if not exist dist\bundles mkdir dist\bundles)
scripts.compile-index-scss: node-sass source\main\index.scss source\main\index.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace source\main\index.css
scripts.compile-demo-index-scss: node-sass source\demo\main\index.scss source\demo\main\index.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace source\demo\main\index.css
scripts.compile: npm run compile-scss && npm run compile-templates && npm run compile-typescript
scripts.deploy: node build\deploy.js && npm run deploy-fonts && xcopy source\img\*.* dist\img /i /s /r /y  && copy dist_configuration\_gitignore dist\.gitignore /y
scripts.bundle: npm run ensure-bundles-dir && webpack && cleancss dist\main\index.css -s -o dist\bundles\raet-ui.css && cleancss dist\demo\main\index.css -s -o dist\demo\bundles\demo.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run deploy && npm run bundle
scripts.start-init: parallelshell "npm run compile-index-scss" "npm run compile-demo-index-scss" "node build\templates.js"
scripts.watch:scss: onchange source/**/*.scss -- parallelshell "npm run compile-index-scss" "npm run compile-demo-index-scss"
scripts.start: npm run start-init && parallelshell "tsc -w" "npm run watch:scss" "npm run watch:templates" "npm run live-server"
scripts.start:test: npm run start-init && parallelshell "tsc -w" "npm run watch:scss" "npm run watch:templates" "npm run live-server:test"
scripts.start:ts: npm run start-init && parallelshell "npm run watch:scss" "npm run watch:templates" "npm run live-server:ts"
